title: Conduct Legal Due Diligence
description: As part of an M&A transaction, a junior associate needs to review a target company's key contracts to identify any legal risks.

tasks.description: Access the virtual data room and locate the 'Material Contracts' folder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully navigates to the correct document repository.

tasks.description: Review each contract for problematic clauses, such as 'change of control' provisions that could be triggered by the acquisition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies several contracts that require third-party consent for a change of control.

tasks.description: Create a due diligence report summarizing the findings and quantifying the potential risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report that flags the consent requirements as a key issue for the deal.
